base_description: White spherical object with a flat base.
part_description: Consists of a round, smooth sphere atop a flat circular base.
internal_interaction_description: The sphere seamlessly connects to the base, with no visible joints, creating a stable structure. The smooth surface of the sphere allows for even distribution of weight onto the base, ensuring balance and stability.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces, serving as a decorative piece or functional component. Its smooth surface may interact with light, creating reflections. It may also be handled by people, requiring minimal effort due to its simple shape.
